name: ramsey/collection
description: A PHP 7.2+ library for representing and manipulating collections.

br:repl: echo ; echo 'Type ./bin/repl to start the REPL.'

scripts-descriptions.br:analyze: Performs static analysis on the code base.
scripts-descriptions.br:build:clean: Removes everything not under version control from the build directory.
scripts-descriptions.br:build:clear-cache: Removes everything not under version control from build/cache/.
scripts-descriptions.br:lint: Checks all source code for coding standards issues.
scripts-descriptions.br:lint:fix: Checks source code for coding standards issues and fixes them, if possible.
scripts-descriptions.br:repl: Note: Use ./bin/repl to run the REPL.
scripts-descriptions.br:test: Runs the full unit test suite.
scripts-descriptions.br:test:all: Runs linting, static analysis, and unit tests.
scripts-descriptions.br:test:coverage:ci: Runs the unit test suite and generates a Clover coverage report.
scripts-descriptions.br:test:coverage:html: Runs the unit tests suite and generates an HTML coverage report.
scripts-descriptions.pre-commit: These commands are run as part of a Git pre-commit hook installed using captainhook/captainhook. Each command should be prepared to accept a list of space-separated staged files.
scripts-descriptions.test: Shortcut to run the full test suite.
